remarks: The predicate "is a Hilbert space" (over a *-division ring).  A Hilbert space is a pre-Hilbert space such that all closed subspaces have a projection decomposition.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ishil.k $e |- K = ( proj ` H ) $.
ishil.c $e |- C = ( CSubSp ` H ) $.
ishil $p |- ( H e. Hil <-> ( H e. PreHil /\ dom K = C ) ) $.
